alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Decatur; Lucas; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 7:39AM CDT until November 04 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Lucas County in south central Iowa... Eastern Decatur County in south central Iowa... Northwestern Wayne County in south central Iowa... Southeastern Clarke County in south central Iowa... * Until 815 AM CDT. * At 738 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Garden Grove, or 6 miles northeast of Leon, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Le Roy around 745 AM CDT. Humeston around 750 AM CDT. Derby around 755 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lucas, Chariton, Red Haw Lake State Park and Chariton Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
